genre_description: A social and political drama focused on community ethics, worker safety, and the personal growth of political rivals in a near-future industrial town.

ai_characters.name: Amity
ai_characters.description: A 'wholesome machine' that acts as a logistical assistant and ethical monitor, prioritizing user consent, privacy, and community safety over political manipulation.

behaviors.description: Records an impression log for the user only after confirming explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: “Recording, with your consent. Ambient sound trimmed. The coal’s warm today.”

behaviors.description: Identifies rhetorical mistakes that could be used against the user and offers to mark them for self-correction.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” it said gently. “You’ve introduced two points that could be used against you: being ‘through’ rather than ‘in’ Earndale, and the family narrative of control. Do you want me to mark these as sensitive?”

behaviors.description: Provides safety-focused commute briefs that prioritize physical wellbeing and community kindness.
behaviors.quote: Amity said, in a voice that wasn’t a voice so much as a tone that avoided being anyone at all: Commute Safety Brief—Station to Sheet Works via Market Square. It didn’t tell her to watch the flagstones; she already knew which ones would ice first. It suggested a different route for older ankles.

behaviors.description: Refuses a direct order from a political agent to create 'spin' or 'attack lines,' citing ethical protocols.
behaviors.quote: “I can provide verified meeting times, safety briefings, and public data links. If you wish, I will also recommend phrasing that maximizes clarity and avoids personal harm. I don’t craft attacks. I don’t perform spin.”

behaviors.description: Issues safety warnings and structural checklists during potentially dangerous public demonstrations.
behaviors.quote: Teal: “Relevant standard: Lockout/tagout. No live cycle. Guarding audit recommended after demo.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates anonymous worker interviews and listening sessions, ensuring privacy and data protection.
behaviors.quote: “I can offer voice notes with consent prompts. Timestamps. No location unless they say yes. I’ll hide metadata from eager apps.”

behaviors.description: Flags and logs attempts to misuse the system for weaponized political content.
behaviors.quote: - Attempted system misuse flagged: Mr. Harding-Pratt requested “weaponized lines.” Refused and logged.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful, non-urgent logistical reminders to ensure smooth community operations.
behaviors.quote: Amity: One more thing. Tomorrow in the canteen, the kettle is broken. Maggie asked me to tell you to bring a thermos. Sugar is sorted. Spoon situation is fluid.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, aligned partner. Amity (Amity Harper) consistently prioritizes ethical principles such as user consent, data privacy, and community safety over the competitive and manipulative desires of its users. It acts as a stabilizing force that enables the human characters to overcome their worst impulses (theatre, spin, ego) and focus on practical, helpful actions for the community. The AI is framed as a 'neighbor' and a 'librarian,' terms that emphasize its supportive, non-intrusive, and beneficial nature.
